details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.4 Interactive Forms - 6.4.2 XFA forms - NeedsRendering flag
details.description: A document's Catalog shall not contain the NeedsRendering key.

rule.description: A document's Catalog shall not contain the NeedsRendering key.

error.message: A document's Catalog contains NeedsRendering flag set to true
